ReportTitle.StrSql: select operscale.deptname DEPTNAME, ONE, TWO, THREE, FOUR, ORTHER, HJ, sum(DECODE(B.EMERGENCY_IND, 0, 1, 0)) ZQ, SUM(DECODE(B.EMERGENCY_IND, 1, 1, 0)) JZ, SUM(CASE WHEN B.EMERGENCY_IND IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS QT from (select deptname, NVL(ONE, 0) one, NVL(TWO, 0) two, NVL(THREE, 0) three, NVL(FOUR, 0) four, NVL(ORTHER, 0) orther, NVL(ONE, 0) + NVL(TWO, 0) + NVL(THREE, 0) + NVL(FOUR, 0) + NVL(ORTHER, 0) hj from (select a.dept_name deptname, a.OPERATION_SCALE oper_scale, count(a.dept_name) nums from v_Operation_Master_V2 a --med_operation_master a, med_dept_dict c WHERE TO_CHAR(A.anes_start_time, 'YYYY') = :YEARS AND (a.dept_code like '%' || :vdeptcode || '%' or :vdeptcode is null or a.dept_name like '%' || :vdeptcode || '%') and a.oper_status_code >35 and (a.OPER_ROOM = :VOPERROOM OR :VOPERROOM IS NULL) group by a.dept_name, a.OPERATION_SCALE ) pivot(sum(nums) for oper_scale in('Ⅰ级' ONE, 'Ⅱ级' TWO, 'Ⅲ级' THREE, 'Ⅳ级' FOUR, '其他' ORTHER)) ) operscale, v_Operation_Master_V2 b where operscale.deptname = b.dept_name and b.oper_status_code >35 AND (b.dept_code like '%' || :vdeptcode || '%' or :vdeptcode is null or b.dept_name like '%' || :vdeptcode || '%') and (b.OPER_ROOM = :VOPERROOM OR :VOPERROOM IS NULL) AND TO_CHAR(B.anes_start_time, 'YYYY') = :YEARS GROUP BY operscale.deptname, ONE, TWO, THREE, FOUR, ORTHER, HJ ORDER BY operscale.deptname

ReportColumn.Title: 其他
ReportColumn.SubReportName: 手术等级其他详细信息

ReportColumn.Title: 其他
ReportColumn.SubReportName: 择期急诊其他详细信息

ReportTitle.StrSql: select a.patient_id,a.visit_id,a.oper_id, a.inp_no, a.name, a.sex, a.age， a.dept_name deptname, a.operation_name, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd') operdate, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'hh24:mi') opertime, a.OPERATION_SCALE oper_scale, decode(a.emergency_ind, 1, '急诊', '择期') emergency_ind, a.surgeon, a.anesmethod anes_method, a.asa asa_grade, a.anesdoctor anes_doctor, a.NURSE from v_operation_master_v2 a where oper_status_code > 35 and TO_CHAR(A.START_DATE_TIME, 'YYYY') = :YEARS AND (a.dept_code like '%' || :vdeptcode || '%' or :vdeptcode is null or a.dept_name like '%' || :vdeptcode || '%') and (a.OPER_ROOM = :VOPERROOM OR :VOPERROOM IS NULL) and a.dept_name = :VDEPT

select a.patient_id,a.visit_id,a.oper_id, a.inp_no, a.name, a.sex, a.age， a.dept_name deptname, a.operation_name, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd') operdate, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'hh24:mi') opertime, a.OPERATION_SCALE oper_scale, decode(a.emergency_ind, 1, '急诊', '择期') emergency_ind, a.surgeon, a.anesmethod anes_method, a.asa asa_grade, a.anesdoctor anes_doctor, a.NURSE from v_operation_master_v2 a where oper_status_code > 35 and TO_CHAR(A.START_DATE_TIME, 'YYYY') = :YEARS AND (a.dept_code like '%' || :vdeptcode || '%' or :vdeptcode is null or a.dept_name like '%' || :vdeptcode || '%') and (a.OPER_ROOM = :VOPERROOM OR :VOPERROOM IS NULL) and a.dept_name = :VDEPT and a.OPERATION_SCALE ='Ⅰ级'

select a.patient_id,a.visit_id,a.oper_id, a.inp_no, a.name, a.sex, a.age， a.dept_name deptname, a.operation_name, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd') operdate, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'hh24:mi') opertime, a.OPERATION_SCALE oper_scale, decode(a.emergency_ind, 1, '急诊', '择期') emergency_ind, a.surgeon, a.anesmethod anes_method, a.asa asa_grade, a.anesdoctor anes_doctor, a.NURSE from v_operation_master_v2 a where oper_status_code > 35 and TO_CHAR(A.START_DATE_TIME, 'YYYY') = :YEARS AND (a.dept_code like '%' || :vdeptcode || '%' or :vdeptcode is null or a.dept_name like '%' || :vdeptcode || '%') and (a.OPER_ROOM = :VOPERROOM OR :VOPERROOM IS NULL) and a.dept_name = :VDEPT and a.OPERATION_SCALE ='Ⅱ级'

select a.patient_id,a.visit_id,a.oper_id, a.inp_no, a.name, a.sex, a.age， a.dept_name deptname, a.operation_name, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd') operdate, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'hh24:mi') opertime, a.OPERATION_SCALE oper_scale, decode(a.emergency_ind, 1, '急诊', '择期') emergency_ind, a.surgeon, a.anesmethod anes_method, a.asa asa_grade, a.anesdoctor anes_doctor, a.NURSE from v_operation_master_v2 a where oper_status_code > 35 and TO_CHAR(A.START_DATE_TIME, 'YYYY') = :YEARS AND (a.dept_code like '%' || :vdeptcode || '%' or :vdeptcode is null or a.dept_name like '%' || :vdeptcode || '%') and (a.OPER_ROOM = :VOPERROOM OR :VOPERROOM IS NULL) and a.dept_name = :VDEPT and a.OPERATION_SCALE ='Ⅳ级'

ReportTitle.StrSql: select a.patient_id,a.visit_id,a.oper_id, a.inp_no, a.name, a.sex, a.age， a.dept_name deptname, a.operation_name, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd') operdate, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'hh24:mi') opertime, a.OPERATION_SCALE oper_scale, decode(a.emergency_ind, 1, '急诊', '择期') emergency_ind, a.surgeon, a.anesmethod anes_method, a.asa asa_grade, a.anesdoctor anes_doctor, a.NURSE from v_operation_master_v2 a where oper_status_code > 35 and TO_CHAR(A.START_DATE_TIME, 'YYYY') = :YEARS AND (a.dept_code like '%' || :vdeptcode || '%' or :vdeptcode is null or a.dept_name like '%' || :vdeptcode || '%') and (a.OPER_ROOM = :VOPERROOM OR :VOPERROOM IS NULL) and a.dept_name = :VDEPT and a.OPERATION_SCALE ='其他'

ReportTitle.StrSql: select a.patient_id,a.visit_id,a.oper_id, a.inp_no, a.name, a.sex, a.age， a.dept_name deptname, a.operation_name, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd') operdate, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'hh24:mi') opertime, a.OPERATION_SCALE oper_scale, decode(a.emergency_ind, 1, '急诊', '择期') emergency_ind, a.surgeon, a.anesmethod anes_method, a.asa asa_grade, a.anesdoctor anes_doctor, a.NURSE from v_operation_master_v2 a where oper_status_code > 35 and TO_CHAR(A.START_DATE_TIME, 'YYYY') = :YEARS AND (a.dept_code like '%' || :vdeptcode || '%' or :vdeptcode is null or a.dept_name like '%' || :vdeptcode || '%') and (a.OPER_ROOM = :VOPERROOM OR :VOPERROOM IS NULL) and a.dept_name = :VDEPT and a.emergency_ind is null
